title: Telehealth Effectiveness by Condition Type
prompt: A rural kitchen table or small-town clinic waiting room bathed in soft morning light, with a laptop or tablet positioned to show a video call interface on screen, hands of an older person reaching toward the device, surrounded by worn medical forms or insurance papers in muted blues and whites, late-day golden light streaming through a window onto worn wooden surfaces, documentary style with shallow depth of field emphasizing the device and hands while keeping the rural domestic setting recognizable but slightly out of focus, conveying quiet dignity and the texture of accessing care from home.
